'''''The Punchy Saurian!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the enemy [[Iktomisaurus]] during the {{Quest|Farewell, Final Saurus Cracker}}.
